steps.plaintext: Locate and talk to the childish Jiang before the allotted time of the game ends.
steps.markdown: Locate and talk to the childish Jiang before the allotted time of the game ends.

steps.plaintext: Jiang's first hiding spot is just up north behind a boulder.
steps.markdown: Jiang's first hiding spot is just up north behind a boulder.

steps.plaintext: Jiang's second hiding spot will be further north, he'll be standing behind a tree to the left.
steps.markdown: Jiang's second hiding spot will be further north, he'll be standing behind a tree to the left.

steps.plaintext: Jiang will then move to his third hiding spot on the east side of the building.
steps.markdown: Jiang will then move to his third hiding spot on the east side of the building.

steps.plaintext: Jiang's final hiding spot is another rock next to the cliff's edge to the south.
steps.markdown: Jiang's final hiding spot is another rock next to the cliff's edge to the south.
